Text: Many thanks for this fine compilation!  I'd been preparing to upload each of the individual books collected herein but this single volume is so much more convenient and manageable.

For fiction not included in this volume, and a series of interviews with Borges on writing, see also the following:

Chronicles of Bustos Domecq (Dutton, 1976): http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8470161/

Six Problems for Don Isidro Parodi (Dutton, 1981): http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8470190/

Borges on Writing (Dutton, 1973): http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8470121/
